# Rock stats

We use [renv](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/) for dependency management.

## Running

```r
./src/rockctl.R
```
## Renv workflow

### Once

Run this on a new project.

``` r
renv::init()
```

### Install packages

The normal way.

### Status

renv::status()

### Snapshot

set the version using the install option if asked for.

renv::snapshot()
